tourtypetitle: Active, Interactive and Authentic Tours of Northeast India

tourtype.title: ACTIVE ADVENTURE
tourtype.text: Our Active Adventure tours in northeast India are for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

tourtype.title: NATURE & CULTURE
tourtype.text: These 8 states lying in the Indo-Burmese and the Himalayan Bio-diversity hotspots are also home to over 150 unique and distinct ethinic groups.

tourtype.title: LAIDBACK LEISURE
tourtype.text: Holidays that take you away from the maddening crowds, kick off your shoes, destress and enjoy the serenity while we take care of the rest.
